column3: Description
Control register.
Debug register.
Byte (8-bit) immediate.
Word (16-bit) immediate.
Word (16-bit) or doubleword (32-bit) immediate.
Doubleword (32-bit) immediate.
Doubleword (32-bit) or quadword (64-bit) immediate.
Quadword (64-bit) immediate.
An operand of unspecified size in memory.
Byte (8-bit) operand in memory.
Word (16-bit) operand in memory.
Word (16-bit) or doubleword (32-bit) operand in memory.
Doubleword (32-bit) operand in memory.
Doubleword (32-bit) or 48-bit operand in memory.
48-bit operand in memory.
Quadword (64-bit) operand in memory.
Double quadword (128-bit) operand in memory.
Two sequential word (16-bit) operands in memory.
A doubleword (32-bit) operand followed by a word (16-bit) operand in memory.
Single-precision (32-bit) floating-point operand in memory.
Word (16-bit) integer operand in memory.
Doubleword (32-bit) integer operand in memory.
Double-precision (64-bit) floating-point operand in memory.
Quadword (64-bit) integer operand in memory.
Double-extended-precision (80-bit) floating-point operand in memory.
80-bit packed BCD operand in memory, containing 18 4-bit BCD digits.
16-bit x87 control word or x87 status word.

14-byte or 28-byte x87 environment. The x87 environment consists of the x87 control word, x87 status word, x87 tag word, last non-control instruction pointer, last data pointer, and opcode of the last non-control instruction completed.
94-byte or 108-byte x87 environment and register stack.
512-byte environment for 128-bit media, 64-bit media, and x87 instructions.
Quadword (64-bit) operand in an MMX register.
Quadword (64-bit) operand in an MMX register, specified as the left-most (first) operand in the instruction syntax.
Quadword (64-bit) operand in an MMX register, specified as the right-most (second) operand in the instruction syntax.
Doubleword (32-bit) operand in an MMX register or memory.
Quadword (64-bit) operand in an MMX register or memory.
Quadword (64-bit) operand in an MMX register or memory, specified as the left-most (first) operand in the instruction syntax.
Quadword (64-bit) operand in an MMX register or memory, specified as the right-most (second) operand in the instruction syntax.
Direct memory offset that specifies an operand in memory.
Direct memory offset that specifies a byte (8-bit) operand in memory.
Direct memory offset that specifies a word (16-bit) operand in memory.
Direct memory offset that specifies a doubleword (32-bit) operand in memory.
Direct memory offset that specifies a quadword (64-bit) operand in memory.
Far pointer with 16-bit selector and 16-bit offset.
Far pointer with 16-bit selector and 32-bit offset.
Operand of unspecified size in a GPR register.

Word (16-bit) operand in a GPR register.

Doubleword (32-bit) operand in a GPR register.

Word (16-bit) operand in a GPR register or memory.
Doubleword (32-bit) operand in a GPR register or memory.
Quadword (64-bit) operand in a GPR register or memory.
Signed 8-bit offset relative to the instruction pointer.
Signed 16-bit offset relative to the instruction pointer.
Signed 32-bit offset relative to the instruction pointer.
Word (16-bit) operand in a segment register.
Word (16-bit) operand in a segment register.
x87 stack register 0.
x87 stack register i, where i is between 0 and 7.
Double quadword (128-bit) operand in an XMM register.
Double quadword (128-bit) operand in an XMM register, specified as the left-most (first) operand in the instruction syntax.

Double octword (256-bit) operand in an YMM register, specified as the left-most (first) operand in the instruction syntax.
Double octword (256-bit) operand in an YMM register, specified as the right-most (second) operand in the instruction syntax.

Double quadword (128-bit) operand in an YMM register or memory.
